content.question: The purpose of the excerpt is best explained as promoting which of the following?

choices.label: Withdrawing United States military support from China before the end of the Second World War
Encouraging the Chinese government to invade the Soviet Union after the Second World War
Forming a military alliance with the communists before the end of the Second World War
Negotiating a peaceful settlement in China to limit Soviet influence after the Second World War

content.answer: Negotiating a peaceful settlement in China to limit Soviet influence after the Second World War

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
